but what makes the punditry panel's unanimity notable is that no one would accuse them of being mccain backers and what's more that they turned up on hardball surely chris matthews were he not on vacation would have found one diehard to deny reality but with mike barnicle guest-hosting a consensus of truth-telling broke out

well he was a major player in the conservative movement and the way i think of tony is he's unique in terms of the extent to which he knew the news side of the business then as a commentator and but also somebody who worked as part of the white house staff as a speechwriter and of course as press secretary and there are very very few people that have had as much experience on both sides of the divide if you will
columnist for the american conservative magazine
